name: C_BOOLEAN
documentation: Constraint on instances of Boolean. Both attributes cannot be set to False, since this would mean that the Boolean value being constrained cannot be True or False.

true_valid.name: true_valid
true_valid.documentation: True if the value True is allowed.

false_valid.name: false_valid
false_valid.documentation: True if the value False is allowed.

assumed_value.name: assumed_value
assumed_value.documentation: The value to assume if this item is not included in data, due to being part of an optional structure.
